titleStmt.title: The duetie of a faithfull and wise magistrate, in preseruing and deliuering of the eommon [sic] wealth from infection, in the time of the plague or pestilence two bookes. Written in Latine by Iohn Ewich, ordinary phisition of the woorthie common wealth of Breame, and newlie turned into English by Iohn Stockwood schoolemaister of Tunbridge. ...
De officio fidelis et prudentis magistratus tempore pestilentiae rempublican a contagio praeservandi liberandique. English
titleStmt.author: Ewich, Johann von, 1525-1588.

Stockwood, John, d. 1610.

publicationStmt.publisher: At the three Cranes in the Vintree by Thomas Dawson,
